Directions: In a bowl, combine the mixed vegetables, water chestnuts, celery, onion and mayonnaise. Stir in cheese. Transfer to a greased shallow 1-qt. baking dish. Toss cracker crumbs and butter; sprinkle over vegetables. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 30-35 minutes or until golden brown.
Ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained and halved
